short_summary: This requirement is for the services of One (1) Intermediate Business Analyst under Stream 2, Business Consulting/Change Management.

full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal for Intermediate Business Analyst**
======================================
**Title:** One (1) Intermediate Business Analyst
**Contract Reference Number:** cb-130-97495995
**Modification Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-249622/A
**Publication Date:** 2024-02-22
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-15
**Amendment Date:** 2024-03-15

**Background**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a qualified supplier to provide the services of one (1) Intermediate Business Analyst, under Stream 2, Business Consulting/Change Management. The contract will be established for a period of one (1) year, with the possibility of extending the term by up to four (4) one-year irrevocable option periods under the same conditions.

**Scope of Work**
The selected supplier will be responsible for providing Intermediate Business Analyst services, including but not limited to:
* Project management
* Business consulting
* Change management

**Eligibility**
Pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Service (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS are eligible to bid on this requirement.

**Location**
The location of work will be in the National Capital Region, with a specific location at 975 Boulevard St-Joseph, Gatineau, Québec.

**Submission Requirements**
Bidders must submit their proposals electronically to the Contracting Authority.

**Security Clearance**
A security clearance of Secret is required for this requirement.

**Inquiries**
Inquiries regarding this Request for Proposal requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority, Kelsey Lawrence, at kelsey.lawrence2@forces.gc.ca.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Additional Information**
For services requirements, bidders must provide the required information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation, in order to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.

Note: A document with a list of pre-qualified suppliers is expected. We do not include this list here.
